responsibilities: Research and develop cross platform AR effect creation tools for the AI Effect Generation system
Work closely with PM and cross-functional teams to design and implement new features for TikTok's AI Effect Generation tools
Drive the design of the future direction of TikTok's AI Effect generation tools
qualifications: Expertise in Generative AI and Graphics technologies
Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams
Strong research and development skills in AR effect creation tools
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on developing AR effect creation tools for an AI Effect Generation system, working with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features for TikTok's AI Effect Generation tools, and driving the design of the future direction of these tools. The skills required include expertise in Generative AI and Graphics technologies, collaboration with cross-functional teams, and strong research and development skills in AR effect creation tools.

The mention of "Generative AI" in the skills section indicates that the job involves working with Generative AI technologies. However, there is no specific mention of language models or Large Language Models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is more on AR effects and graphics technologies rather than language processing or generation, which are typically associated with LLMs.

Therefore, while the job involves working with Generative AI, it does not specifically involve working with language models or LLMs.
